name: Benson Dawson
description: I am Dawson,a mixed Italian American,single and never been married before,no kids,not in a relationship,i am a very down to earth man,easy going,honest,loving,caring,romantic,hard working,i am understanding,i am creative,i am a family oriented man,i am a man that has high respect and value for women,i do not smoke, i only drink a glass of red wine once a while,i believe in a one man to one woman type of relationship,i am new here and hoping to find that loving woman who would want to spend the rest of her life together with me,i am not here for games,because i don’t have such time,i am a busy man and i am only here for our purpose and that is a serious relationship with the aim of marriage.
